channel.title: Docs on Dynamic projections
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Dynamic projections

item.title: Replication
item.description: Replication FIrst clone this repo: https://github.com/EduardoVernier/dynamic-projections Recreating the results / Testing new methods and datasets Set up virtual env and dependencies using pipenv. https://pipenv.readthedocs.io/en/latest/ pip install pipenv pipenv run pip install pip==18.0 pipenv install sudo apt-get install python3-tk To run a script use pipenv run python <script_name>.py. To open notebooks use pipenv run jupyter notebook or create a new shell with pipenv shell and then call jupyter notebook.
